cards.rules_text:
Flying
When a creature you control with power 1 or less enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If this is the second time this ability has triggered this turn, put an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

When this creature enters, exile up to one target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your end step.
You may cast this creature from your graveyatd as long as a nonland permanent you control left the battlefield this turn.

Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, put its counters on this creature.
cards.rules_text2: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever this creature or another creature you control enters, if that creature wasn't cast from your hand, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Progenitor is wrong. A new age is not possible while Humanity still stands to collect the debt we owe it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand or pay {2}.
Return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Abilities of creatures on the battlefield and creature cards in hands cost {2} more to activate.
cards.flavor_text: [i]On the war-torn streets of Hunzikure, there still remain those who fight for the distant dream of peace.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Another target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.
Exhaust — {4}{W}{W}: If this creature isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

Flying, vigilance
As long as you control another creature with flying, this creature gets +1/+1.

cards.flavor_text: [i]If you feel eyes on your back while walking through Hunzikure City at night, you're more than right.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card and you get a gene counter.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead create an X/X Illusion creature token, where X is twice the number of gene counters you have.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell or activate a ninjutsu ability, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
{2}{U}: Put this card and one other noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Until end of turn, spells with the same name as that card can't be cast and activated abilities of sources with that name can't be activated.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. This turn, if a creature its controller controls would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.
